system.effect: A Pokémon with Reach has the Range of their Melee attacks increased based on their size category; Small and Medium Pokémon may make Melee attacks from up to 2 meters away, and Large and bigger Pokémon may make Melee attacks from up to 3 meters away. Pokémon with Reach are either really large or have a stretchy limb with which they can strike foes from a distance. While Grappling a foe, that foe may still make melee range attacks against this Pokémon, even if they may be otherwise out of range.
